title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe how the scenario illustrates the power of the purse.

For Task A2, the response must explain how the Unfunded Mandate Reform Act affects the relationship between the states and the federal government.

For Task B, the response must explain an advantage of using an unfunded mandate to administer the Americans with Disabilities Act.

For Task C1, the response must describe the constitutional amendment that most supports the power of state governments in this situation, and explain how it relates to the scenario.

For Task C2, the response must explain how the constitutional amendment relates to the scenario.
